attributes.action: stop councils operating their own police force.
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign my petition to stop councils operating their own police force for imposing unfair penalties on their residents.

Impose fines and name and shame all thoses council who operate their own police force.

Signing this petition you are saying only one law enforcement should operate in all boroughs the Met.

rejection.details: This is not a matter for central government but for local councils.
